titleStmt.title: A second generall epistle to all the saints wherein is unfolded the covenant of grace, as its a law in the spirit, of light, liberty, righteousness, holinesse, power and glory : as likewise as it is a law of peace, love and edification : published for the good of those who love peace and holinesse / written by T. Collier.
titleStmt.author: Collier, Thomas, fl. 1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
